org.theospi.portfolio.help.model

Interface HelpManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HelpManagerImpl

    public interface HelpManager
    Responsible for managing help activities. This includes managing contexts, resources, the glossary, and the table of contents.
    See Also:
    Glossary

    • Method Detail

      • searchGlossary

        GlossaryEntry searchGlossary(String keyword)
        searches the glossary for the keyword. Returns a GlossaryEntry for this keyword if found, return null if no entry is found.
        Parameters:
        keyword -
        Returns:
